attributes.action: Raise the Inheritance Tax Threshold to £1 million as promised
attributes.additional_details:
At the General Election the Conservatives promised to raise the Inheritance tax threshold to £1 million pounds. The British people want it the less well off deserve it.
Parliament should debate this issue and give it members the say rather that senior party Politicians.
Please Chancellor give us what we have been waiting for

Regards

Usman Ahmed
